title: Strategy Manager, Cloud Marketing
description: Strategy & Operations (S&O) professionals in Google’s Marketing organization provide business critical insights and analytics, ensure cross-functional alignment of goals and execution, and help teams drive strategic partnerships and new initiatives forward.
key_qualifications:
Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
6 years of experience in management consulting / venture capital / private equity.
preferred_qualifications:
MBA Degree.
Experience in a role requiring impeccable business judgment, rigorous analytical problem solving, quantitative analysis, and communicating findings to senior management.
Ability to work across teams, build relationships, and influence senior managers.
Tolerance for ambiguity and ability to work in a fast-changing environment, with an entrepreneurial approach.
Excellent written and oral communication skills and strong interpersonal skills.
Excellent senior stakeholder management and leadership skills.
responsibilities:
Partner with leadership to set Cloud Marketing’s annual strategic plan globally, articulating Cloud Marketing’s most critical priorities, and corresponding investment. Develop C-level deliverables.
Work across all of Google Cloud’s products to develop solutions to the organization’s toughest strategic challenges and initiatives.
Improve overall Marketing efficiency and effectiveness by applying a rigorous approach to Marketing’s operational processes.
Evaluate Marketing performance / impact and make data-driven recommendations for how to adjust our approach to reach our ambitious goals.
